articles.title: Marwell Zoo break-in: Four charged after giraffe harassed - BBC
articles.description: Armed officers were sent to the zoo after reports of the break-in were shared on social media.
articles.content:
Four people have been charged after items were thrown at a giraffe during a break-in at a zoo, causing it "unnecessary suffering".
